description.value:
Your methodology emphasizes chemical and alchemical analysis, collecting information from unusual particles and fluids found on the scene. You possess enough alchemical know-how to whip up a few tinctures to help you with your cases.

You're trained in Crafting and gain the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.Alchemical Crafting]{Alchemical Crafting} skill feat. In addition, you gain a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Formula Book (Blank)]{Formula Book (Blank)} for free and learn the formulas for two additional common 1st-level alchemical items, which must be elixirs or tools. Each time you gain a level, you learn the formula for one common alchemical elixir or alchemical tool of any level of item you can create.

During your daily preparations, you can create a number of versatile vials-alchemical concoctions that can quickly be turned into elixirs and tools-equal to your Intelligence modifier. You can use the @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Quick Tincture]{Quick Tincture}action to turn one of these vials into an elixir or alchemical tool for which you know the formula.
